name: EarlyCareer
description: This team member is early in their career. They have a higher chance of gaining skill points. There's a 33% to chance to change to Mid career each year.

name: MidCareer
description: This team member is mid-career. 33% chance to change to Late career each year. Average chance of gaining skill points.

name: LateCareer
description: This team member is late in their career. 33% chance to change to Final year each year. Lower chance of gaining skill points, chance of losing skill points.

name: LastYear
description: This team member is in the last year of their career, and will retire at the end of the season.

name: PartyAnimal
description: This team member loves to party before a big day. They are more likely to get the 'Partied Too Hard' trait before a qualifier or race.
